name: WeeZ
description:
-Story-

Monsters have stolen king's crown and you're the only one who can return it. You must defeat all enemies and overcome 12 floors of a dangerous tower of monsters to get to the crown.

To defeat enemies every 2 floors you'll get 1 new magic spell.

-Controls-

•W A S D - Move Cursor

•E - Action

•Q - Cancel / Pause

After Beating The Game,  You Can Choose Any Floor You Want.

•Z - Next Floor

•X - Last Floor

Made For LowRezJam2018 in around 2 weeks.
